title: Pynnnen
extract: The new meaning of customer value: a systemic perspective. Author(s): Mikko Pynnönen (Associate Professor in the Faculty of Technology Management and a Project Manager at the Technology Business Research Center at Lappeenranta University of Technology, Lappeenranta, Finland)
